title: Xerotricha zaratei
text: Xerotricha zaratei is a <a href="species">species</a> of air-breathing <a href="land%20snail">land snail</a>, <a href="Terrestrial%20animal">terrestrial</a> <a href="pulmonate">pulmonate</a> <a href="gastropod">gastropod</a> <a href="mollusk">mollusk</a>s in the family <a href="Geomitridae">Geomitridae</a>, the hairy snails and their allies. This species is <a href="Endemism">endemic</a> to <a href="Spain">Spain</a>.
